de:
Ihre erste Kitesurfschule in Le Havre
anfänger, Fortgeschrittene, Perfektionisten
- kitesurfkurse
- stand Up Paddle-Kurse
- kite-/Foil-Simulator
- wingfoil
- gezogene Bojen
en:
Welcome to the Havre Kitesurf School based in Le Havre open 7 days a week from April to November.

Come and discover in a friendly and safe spirit the many sporting activities, to best adapt to your expectations, the Le Havre kitesurfing schools...
it:
La vostra prima scuola di kitesurf a Le Havre
principianti, intermedi, avanzati
- lezioni di kitesurf
- lezioni di stand up paddle
- simulatore di aquilone/velivolo
- foglio alare
- boe trainate
fr:
Votre première Ecole de Kitesurf au Havre
débutants, intermédiaires, perfectionnements
- cours de kitesurf
- cours de stand up paddle
- simulateur kite/foil
- wingfoil
- bouées tractées
nl:
Uw eerste Kitesurfschool in Le Havre
beginners, gemiddeld, gevorderden
- kitesurflessen
- stand up paddle lessen
- kite/foil simulator
- vleugelprofiel
- gesleepte boeien
es:
Tu primera Escuela de Kitesurf en Le Havre
principiantes, intermedios, avanzados
- clases de kitesurf
- clases de stand up paddle
- simulador de cometa/pluma
- wingfoil
- boyas remolcadas

de:
Ihre erste Kitesurfschule in Le Havre
anfänger, Fortgeschrittene, Perfektionisten
- kitesurfkurse
- stand Up Paddle-Kurse
- kite-/Foil-Simulator
- wingfoil
- gezogene Bojen
en:
Welcome to the Havre Kitesurf School based in Le Havre open 7 days a week from April to November.

Come and discover in a friendly and safe spirit the many sporting activities, to best adapt to your expectations, the Le Havre kitesurfing schools offer you different formulas.

For beginners, intermediates, advanced:
- kitesurfing lessons
- stand up paddle lessons
- kite / foil simulator
- wingfoil
- towed buoys

de: Basierend auf der Eröffnungsperiode des Vorjahres.
en: Based on the previous year's opening period.
it: In base al periodo di apertura dell'anno precedente.
fr: Basé sur la période d'ouverture de l'année précédente.
nl: Gebaseerd op de openingsperiode van het voorgaande jaar.
es: Basado en el periodo de apertura del año anterior.
